```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> c = np.array([1, 3, 6, 10])    # First column of T
>>> r = np.array([1, -1, -2, -3])  # First row of T
>>> b = np.array([1, 2, 2, 5]) 
```

```py
>>> from scipy.linalg import solve_toeplitz, toeplitz
>>> x = solve_toeplitz((c, r), b)
>>> x
array([ 1.66666667, -1\.        , -2.66666667,  2.33333333]) 
```
